info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 4:50PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS... HAZARDS...Moderate to heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 448 PM EST, scattered snow showers were moving across portions of the southern Adirondacks and Lake George Saratoga region. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Warrensburg, Whitehall, Indian Lake, Speculator, Old Forge, Lake George Village, Fort Edward, Corinth, Granville, Johnsburg, Hartford, Dorset, Edinburg, Lake Pleasant, Hague, Wells, Inlet and Brown Tract Pond Campground. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 26. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
